summary: After the Chicago Cubs blow an opportunity to reach the World Series in 2003, Cubs fans blame the team's misfortune on fellow fan Steve Bartman, who interfered with a foul ball and prevented Moises Alou from making a catch.
cast: Alex Gibney|Dave Kaplan|Bob Costas|Dwight Evans|Denis Leary|Bill Buckner|Bob Ryan|Ron Borges|Steve Lyons|Scott Turow|Wayne Drehs|Eric Karros|Josh Doust|Jeff Gowen|Matt Liston|Dave Placko|Jim Cuthbert|Laurie Holmes|Pat Looney|Brian J. Hedger|Jim Litke|Mike Lowell|Jeff Funke|John Kass|Steve Adamczyk|Erika Amundsen|Rod Blagojevich|Moises Alou|Thomas Hoffman|Walter Yurkanin|Kathleen Rolenz|Steve Bartman|Captain Janks|Vin Scully|Dusty Baker|Thom Brennamen|Tom Brokaw|Leon Durham|Will Ferrell|Alex Gonzalez|Derek Jeter|Al Leiter|Bernie Mac|John McNamara|Dan Patrick|Mark Prior|Babe Ruth|Dan Shaughnessy|Bob Stanley|Michael Wilbon|Dontrelle Willis
title: Catching Hell
